text: William Pocock (1848 - 27 September 1928) was an English cricketer. He played eight first-class matches for New South Wales and Canterbury between 1872/73 and 1883/84. He was a cousin of W. G. Grace. ==See also== * List of New South Wales representative cricketers ==References== ==External links== * Category:1848 births Category:1928 deaths Category:English cricketers Category:New South Wales cricketers Category:Canterbury cricketers Category:Sportspeople from Bristol Category:W. G. Grace Category:Grace family
title: William Pocock
